mapper.select: select po.post_no postNo, po.cate_no cateNo, po.post_title postTitle, po.post_content postContent, po.reg_date regDate from post po,category ca where po.cate_no=ca.cate_no and ca.user_no=#{userNo} order by po.reg_date desc

select post_title postTitle, post_content postContent from (select rownum rown, post_title,post_content from ( select post_title,post_content from post po, category ca where po.cate_no=ca.cate_no and ca.user_no=#{userNo} order by po.reg_date desc)) where rown=1

select post_title postTitle, post_content postContent from (select rownum rown, post_title,post_content from ( select post_title,post_content from post po, category ca where po.cate_no=ca.cate_no and ca.user_no=#{userNo} and po.cate_no=#{selectedCategoryNo} order by po.reg_date desc)) where rown=1

select po.post_no postNo, po.cate_no cateNo, po.post_title postTitle, po.post_content postContent, po.reg_date regDate from post po,category ca where po.cate_no=ca.cate_no and ca.user_no=#{userNo} and po.cate_no=#{selectedCategoryNo} order by po.reg_date desc

select ca.cate_no cateNo,user_no userNo,cate_name cateName,description,reg_date regDate,post_count postCount from category ca, (select ca.cate_no, count(post_no) post_count from category ca, post po where ca.cate_no=po.cate_no(+) group by ca.cate_no) po where ca.cate_no = po.cate_no and user_no=#{userNo}
mapper.delete: delete from guestbook where no=#{no} and password=#{password}
mapper.update: update blog set blog_title=#{blogTitle} where user_NO=#{userNo}
